content.test: Follow-up question test (prove we can do multi-turn conversation)
content.context: You suggested consolidating after 50 messages OR 1 hour (whichever comes first). Good answer.
content.followup_question: What should we do with the consolidation output? Store it as a separate summary document, or merge it back into the JSONL and just mark it as 'consolidated'?
content.why_asking: This affects the data model. We need to know: separate files or single append-only stream?
